### PR summary [516426b1b8](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15090/commits/516426b1b8a3ef2d8f63a0aa575c49ac4a40e867)

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/653a5e7d-b6a2-47ba-805c-4f58e064462b) for commit 027d43d0d17c3dd09e48dcf04ddae8475c39a475.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/646df27a-07a2-40ff-9872-b41b72f2663e) for commit 24279429aeaf58e0a8bd857d2825823441599212.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/285e23a1-625f-4710-bfb6-cf2dfeadba40/to/646df27a-07a2-40ff-9872-b41b72f2663e) against commit d9ce431ce3f2cdeddd95a273731766559bd8c4da.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/70b26b53-c208-4c85-944d-55ee34390fc6) for commit 516426b1b8a3ef2d8f63a0aa575c49ac4a40e867.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/285e23a1-625f-4710-bfb6-cf2dfeadba40/to/70b26b53-c208-4c85-944d-55ee34390fc6) against commit d9ce431ce3f2cdeddd95a273731766559bd8c4da.
Wrapping all of `rw` with `transparencyMode := .reducible` doesn't seem to yield much benefit
